mapper.select: SELECT id, genre, bookname, author, publisher, comment FROM bookinfo WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bookinfo (genre, bookname, author, publisher, comment) VALUES (#{book.genre}, #{book.bookname}, #{book.author}, #{book.publisher}, #{book.comment})
mapper.update: UPDATE bookinfo SET genre = #{book.genre}, bookname = #{book.bookname}, author = #{book.author}, publisher = #{book.publisher}, comment = #{book.comment} where id = #{id}
